Name: Green Beast (Fresh Version)
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add remaining ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: A whole shot of absinthe tamed by lime, sugar and plenty of water. The cucumber is an essential freshening element.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2010 for Pernod Absinthe by Charles Vexenat in Paris, France.
